Ledian (TCG)

  • Language
  • Watch
  • View source
← #0165: Ledyba
Pokémon
#0167: Spinarak →
For Pokémon TCG Pocket cards, see Ledian (TCG Pocket).

Ledian has been featured on 12 different cards since it debuted in the Neo Genesis expansion of the Pokémon Trading Card Game. Ledian cards are normally Grass-type Stage 1 Pokémon.

List of Pokémon cards featuring Ledian

Ledian
Cards listed with a blue background are only legal to use in the current Expanded format.
Cards listed with a green background are legal to use in both the current Standard and Expanded formats.
